lumis.service.commentit

Class CommentItService

  • java.lang.Object
    • lumis.portal.service.GenericService
      • lumis.service.commentit.CommentItService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IService

    public class CommentItService
extends GenericService
    Service class for CommentIt. This class ensures that when an instance of this service is deleted, all comments from this service instance are deleted too.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Version:
    $Revision: 17049 $ $Date: 2015-03-03 11:26:53 -0300 (Tue, 03 Mar 2015) $
